critical.title: Core AI/ML Expertise
critical.current: No explicit mention of Machine Learning, TensorFlow, PyTorch, or LLMs.
critical.required: Python, Machine Learning, TensorFlow, PyTorch, LLMs (critical)
critical.description: The job requires deep expertise in core AI/ML frameworks and LLMs, which are not present in the CV. This is fundamental for the role's responsibilities.

critical.title: Years of Experience
critical.description: The candidate falls short of the required 10 years of experience. While senior, the specific duration requirement might be a strict filter for this role.

important.title: MLOps and Production ML
important.current: CI/CD and TDD mentioned, but no specific MLOps or ML in production experience.
important.description: While the candidate has CI/CD experience, the JD emphasizes MLOps and deploying ML models to production, which is a distinct skill set not explicitly demonstrated.

important.title: Specific AI Domains
important.current: No explicit mention of NLP or Computer Vision.
important.description: The role values expertise in NLP and Computer Vision. While general ML knowledge is transferable, specific domain experience is preferred and not evident.

nice_to_have.title: Vector Databases
nice_to_have.description: Vector databases are listed as a 'nice-to-have' skill. Their absence is not a significant drawback but would be a bonus.

nice_to_have.title: Rust
nice_to_have.description: Rust is a 'nice-to-have' skill. Its absence is not a concern for the core requirements of the role.

strengths.title: Strong Software Engineering Foundation
strengths.description: 8 years of experience in software engineering, with a proven track record in building scalable systems and leading projects.
strengths.evidence: 8 years of experience, Senior Software Engineer roles at Tech Corp and StartupXYZ, built scalable microservices handling 1M+ requests/day, led team of 5 engineers.

strengths.title: Proficiency in Python
strengths.description: Python is a core requirement for AI/ML roles, and the candidate has extensive experience developing with it.
strengths.evidence: Python listed as a technical skill, developed REST APIs using Python Flask.

strengths.title: Cloud and Containerization Expertise
strengths.description: Experience with AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes aligns with modern production environments for AI/ML applications.
strengths.evidence: AWS, Docker, Kubernetes listed as technical skills.

strengths.title: DevOps and Automation Skills
strengths.description: Experience with CI/CD and implementing automated testing frameworks demonstrates an understanding of efficient development lifecycles.
strengths.evidence: CI/CD, TDD, Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 80%, Built automated testing framework.

strengths.title: Leadership and Collaboration
strengths.description: Demonstrated ability to lead teams and collaborate effectively, crucial for a senior role in a startup environment.
strengths.evidence: Technical leadership soft skill, Led team of 5 engineers in cloud migration project, Team collaboration soft skill.

key_blockers: Missing critical AI/ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch) and LLM experience.
Insufficient years of experience (8 vs. 10 required).
Lack of demonstrated MLOps and production ML deployment experience.
No explicit experience in key AI domains like NLP or Computer Vision.
